abstract: Owners of the Microsoft Xbox 360 have watched their machines break down. But the game Halo 3 could redeem the company going into the holiday selling season.
snippet: Owners of the Microsoft Xbox 360 have watched their machines break down. But the game Halo 3 could redeem the company going into the holiday selling season.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Aug. 12— Imagine your blender breaking down twice. The vacuum cleaner giving up the ghost three times. The espresso maker repeatedly going kaput. Then imagine replacing the item with the same model over and over while keeping your brand loyalty and sanity.

headline.main: Xbox 360 Out of Order? For Loyalists, No Worries
headline.print_headline: Xbox 360 Out of Order? For Loyalists, No Worries

abstract: EMC plans to raise $1.1 billion this week in an offering for its VMware unit. Analysts say VMware’s technology is wanted by big corporations, ahead of competitors, and trouble for Microsoft.
snippet: EMC plans to raise $1.1 billion this week in an offering for its VMware unit. Analysts say VMware’s technology is wanted by big corporations, ahead of competitors, and trouble for Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Last Thursday, when stock markets around the world fell in a panicky swoon, VMware calmly nudged up the price range on in its initial public offering.

headline.main: As the Market Wobbles, VMware Is Bullish on Its Offering This Week
